document.full_text: u.s. film studio warner brothers said it would offer five additional movies for rent on social networking website facebook, a further sign of intensifying competition in renting out movies on the internet.
document.title: warner bros to rent 5 more movies on facebook
lines_and_colors: u.s. film studio warner brothers said it would offer five additional movies for rent on social networking website facebook, a further sign of intensifying competition in renting out movies on the internet.
